languages.text: "Клубок очень запутанный, много в нем ниточек сплелось, каждая в свою сторону тянуть пытается. Марионетки считают, что у них своя воля, но это лишь потому что им так велят — уж больно искусный кукловод попался. Черная длань его далеко, но от того лишь страшнее. Даже пестрая кукла, что как черт из коробочки выпрыгивает и скачет где ей вздумается, делает это с его дозволения".

traits.locale_text: "Клубок очень запутанный, много в нем ниточек сплелось, каждая в свою сторону тянуть пытается. Марионетки считают, что у них своя воля, но это лишь потому что им так велят — уж больно искусный кукловод попался. Черная длань его далеко, но от того лишь страшнее. Даже пестрая кукла, что как черт из коробочки выпрыгивает и скачет где ей вздумается, делает это с его дозволения".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "The threads are very tangled, some of them are woven together, but each one is trying to pull in its own direction. The puppets think that they have free will, but it's only because they have been ordered to think and act so — this is a skilled puppet master at work here. His dark hand is far away, but that only makes it more terrifying. Even a colourful doll that springs out like a Jack-in-the-box and scampers around wherever it pleases does so by his leave."
languages.original_text: "Клубок очень запутанный, много в нем ниточек сплелось, каждая в свою сторону тянуть пытается. Марионетки считают, что у них своя воля, но это лишь потому что им так велят — уж больно искусный кукловод попался. Черная длань его далеко, но от того лишь страшнее. Даже пестрая кукла, что как черт из коробочки выпрыгивает и скачет где ей вздумается, делает это с его дозволения".

His dark hand is far away, but that only makes it more terrifying. Even a colourful doll that springs out like a Jack-in-the-box and scampers around wherever it pleases does so by his leave."

The puppets think that they have free will, but it's only because they have been ordered to think and act so — this is a skilled puppet master at work here. His dark hand is far away, but that only makes it more terrifying. Even a colourful doll that springs out like a Jack-in-the-box and scampers around wherever it pleases does so by his leave."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “所有的线都缠在一起。有的线已经被编织在了一起，但每根线都想往自己的方向拉扯。那些木偶误以为他们拥有自由，但这不过是因为他们得到了命令，才会如此思考，如此行动。操纵他们的人，是技艺精湛的木偶大师。尽管他的黑手远在天边，但这只会让这一切更加可怕。即便只是个普通的玩偶，突然从玩具盒中跳出来，在喜欢的地方钻来钻去，也都是由他的意志所决定。”
languages.original_text: "The threads are very tangled, some of them are woven together, but each one is trying to pull in its own direction. The puppets think that they have free will, but it's only because they have been ordered to think and act so — this is a skilled puppet master at work here. His dark hand is far away, but that only makes it more terrifying. Even a colourful doll that springs out like a Jack-in-the-box and scampers around wherever it pleases does so by his leave."

traits.locale_text: “所有的线都缠在一起。有的线已经被编织在了一起，但每根线都想往自己的方向拉扯。那些木偶误以为他们拥有自由，但这不过是因为他们得到了命令，才会如此思考，如此行动。操纵他们的人，是技艺精湛的木偶大师。尽管他的黑手远在天边，但这只会让这一切更加可怕。即便只是个普通的玩偶，突然从玩具盒中跳出来，在喜欢的地方钻来钻去，也都是由他的意志所决定。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "The threads are very tangled, some of them are woven together, but each one is trying to pull in its own direction. The puppets think that they have free will, but it's only because they have been ordered to think and act so — this is a skilled puppet master at work here. His dark hand is far away, but that only makes it more terrifying. Even a colourful doll that springs out like a Jack-in-the-box and scampers around wherever it pleases does so by his leave."

languages.text: «Los hilos están enmarañados, algunos incluso entretejidos, pero todos intentan tirar hacia su lado. Las marionetas creen que son libres, pero solo porque les han ordenado pensar y actuar como así fuera: esto es obra de un titiritero habilidoso. Su mano negra se encuentra muy lejos, lo que solo la hace más aterradora. Incluso la muñeca colorida que salta de su caja y corretea por donde quiere solo puede hacerlo porque él se lo permite».
languages.original_text: "The threads are very tangled, some of them are woven together, but each one is trying to pull in its own direction. The puppets think that they have free will, but it's only because they have been ordered to think and act so — this is a skilled puppet master at work here. His dark hand is far away, but that only makes it more terrifying. Even a colourful doll that springs out like a Jack-in-the-box and scampers around wherever it pleases does so by his leave."

traits.locale_text: «Los hilos están enmarañados, algunos incluso entretejidos, pero todos intentan tirar hacia su lado. Las marionetas creen que son libres, pero solo porque les han ordenado pensar y actuar como así fuera: esto es obra de un titiritero habilidoso. Su mano negra se encuentra muy lejos, lo que solo la hace más aterradora. Incluso la muñeca colorida que salta de su caja y corretea por donde quiere solo puede hacerlo porque él se lo permite».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「糸は複雑に絡み合っている。何本かは共に編まれているが、それぞれが独自の方向に引っ張ろうとしている。人形たちは自分たちに自由意志があると思っているが、それはそう考え、そう行動するように命令されているからに他ならない。それが熟練した人形師の技。彼の黒い手は遠くにあるが、それがより恐ろしい。びっくり箱のように飛び出し、好きなところを歩き回る色とりどりの人形でさえも、彼の命令によってそうしているのよ」
languages.original_text: "The threads are very tangled, some of them are woven together, but each one is trying to pull in its own direction. The puppets think that they have free will, but it's only because they have been ordered to think and act so — this is a skilled puppet master at work here. His dark hand is far away, but that only makes it more terrifying. Even a colourful doll that springs out like a Jack-in-the-box and scampers around wherever it pleases does so by his leave."

traits.locale_text: 「糸は複雑に絡み合っている。何本かは共に編まれているが、それぞれが独自の方向に引っ張ろうとしている。人形たちは自分たちに自由意志があると思っているが、それはそう考え、そう行動するように命令されているからに他ならない。それが熟練した人形師の技。彼の黒い手は遠くにあるが、それがより恐ろしい。びっくり箱のように飛び出し、好きなところを歩き回る色とりどりの人形でさえも、彼の命令によってそうしているのよ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Die Fäden sind völlig verheddert, manche sind miteinander verwoben, doch ein jeder versucht, in seine eigene Richtung zu ziehen. Die Marionetten glauben, sie hätten einen freien Willen. Doch das glauben sie nur, weil ihnen befohlen wurde, so zu denken und so zu handeln — hier ist ein meisterlicher Puppenspieler am Werk. Seine dunkle Hand ist weit entfernt, doch das macht sie nur umso furchterregender. Selbst ein Springteufel, der aus einer Kiste hüpft und nach Belieben herumläuft, tut das nur mit seiner Erlaubnis."
languages.original_text: "The threads are very tangled, some of them are woven together, but each one is trying to pull in its own direction. The puppets think that they have free will, but it's only because they have been ordered to think and act so — this is a skilled puppet master at work here. His dark hand is far away, but that only makes it more terrifying. Even a colourful doll that springs out like a Jack-in-the-box and scampers around wherever it pleases does so by his leave."

traits.locale_text: "Die Fäden sind völlig verheddert, manche sind miteinander verwoben, doch ein jeder versucht, in seine eigene Richtung zu ziehen. Die Marionetten glauben, sie hätten einen freien Willen. Doch das glauben sie nur, weil ihnen befohlen wurde, so zu denken und so zu handeln — hier ist ein meisterlicher Puppenspieler am Werk. Seine dunkle Hand ist weit entfernt, doch das macht sie nur umso furchterregender. Selbst ein Springteufel, der aus einer Kiste hüpft und nach Belieben herumläuft, tut das nur mit seiner Erlaubnis."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Les fils sont complètement emmêlés, certains sont même tissés ensemble, mais chacun tire dans une direction différente. Les marionnettes croient disposer du libre arbitre, mais seulement parce qu'un marionnettiste de talent leur a ordonné d'agir et de penser ainsi. Bien que sa main sombre soit loin, ce n'en est que plus terrifiant. Même une poupée colorée qui jaillit comme un diable à ressort et gambade à droite et à gauche le fait avec sa permission. »
languages.original_text: "The threads are very tangled, some of them are woven together, but each one is trying to pull in its own direction. The puppets think that they have free will, but it's only because they have been ordered to think and act so — this is a skilled puppet master at work here. His dark hand is far away, but that only makes it more terrifying. Even a colourful doll that springs out like a Jack-in-the-box and scampers around wherever it pleases does so by his leave."

traits.locale_text: « Les fils sont complètement emmêlés, certains sont même tissés ensemble, mais chacun tire dans une direction différente. Les marionnettes croient disposer du libre arbitre, mais seulement parce qu'un marionnettiste de talent leur a ordonné d'agir et de penser ainsi. Bien que sa main sombre soit loin, ce n'en est que plus terrifiant. Même une poupée colorée qui jaillit comme un diable à ressort et gambade à droite et à gauche le fait avec sa permission. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "İpler karman çorman. Bazıları birbirlerine işlenmiş olsa da hepsi, bir diğerlerini kendi yoluna çekmek derdinde. Kuklalar, hür iradeleri olduğu hayaline kapılmışlar. Bilmezler ki yalnızca böyle düşünmeleri ve böyle davranmaları emredilmiş. Pek yetenekli bir kuklacı ile karşı karşıyayız. Karanlık dokunuşlarıyla uzaktan müdahale ediyor. Çok ürkünç bir durum. Sürpriz kutusundan fırlayıp istediği gibi koşup duran rengârenk oyuncaklar bile onun izni olmaksızın hareket edemiyor."
languages.original_text: "The threads are very tangled, some of them are woven together, but each one is trying to pull in its own direction. The puppets think that they have free will, but it's only because they have been ordered to think and act so — this is a skilled puppet master at work here. His dark hand is far away, but that only makes it more terrifying. Even a colourful doll that springs out like a Jack-in-the-box and scampers around wherever it pleases does so by his leave."

traits.locale_text: "İpler karman çorman bir hâlde. Bazıları birbirlerine işlenmiş ancak her biri, diğerlerini kendi yoluna çekmenin derdinde. Kuklalar, hür iradeleri olduğu hayaline kapılmışlar. Bilmezler ki yalnızca böyle düşünmeleri ve böyle davranmaları emredilmiş. Pek yetenekli bir kuklacı ile karşı karşıyayız. Karanlık dokunuşlarıyla uzaktan müdahale ediyor lakin bu hakikat, çok daha ürkütücü. Sürpriz kutusundaki yaylarından fırlayarak istediği gibi koşuşturup duran rengârenk bir oyuncak bile onun izni olmaksızın hareket edemiyor."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
